description: Launch voice collection campaigns for feature phones, list active tasks, and monitor campaign stats. Validate and transcribe audio samples automatically to ensure high-quality datasets. Credit mobile data rewards instantly to drive participant engagement.

capabilities.name: create_campaign
capabilities.description:
Create new voice collection campaign

Requires API key for authentication and credit deduction.
Cost: $0.40 per sample (target_samples * $0.40)

capabilities.name: calculate_campaign_cost
capabilities.description:
Calculate cost before creating campaign

Returns total cost, reward cost, platform margin, and credits required.
Pricing: $0.40/sample total ($0.25 contributor reward + $0.15 platform margin)

capabilities.name: get_billing_usage
capabilities.description:
Check credit balance and usage for an API customer

Returns customer info, credits balance, total spent, and plan details.
Requires valid API key for authentication.

capabilities.name: purchase_credits
capabilities.description:
Purchase credits for campaign creation

Credits are used at $0.40 per credit (1 credit = 1 sample).
Accepts 'stripe' or 'paypal' as payment methods.

capabilities.name: get_billing_transactions
capabilities.description:
Get billing transaction history for an API customer

Returns recent credit purchases and campaign charges.
Shows transaction type, credits delta, amount in USD, and timestamps.

capabilities.name: credit_data_reward
capabilities.description: Credit mobile data reward to contributor's phone

capabilities.name: get_user_earnings
capabilities.description:
Get earnings for a contributor by phone number

Returns total data earned (MB), total samples submitted, and valid samples.

capabilities.name: list_reward_transactions
capabilities.description:
List reward transactions with optional filters

Filter by phone number, campaign ID, or status (pending/completed/failed).
Returns transaction details including reward amount, telco, and timestamps.
